actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 39.
name: Shelly Deckert Dick
nominee: Shelly Deckert Dick, of Louisiana, to be United States District Judge for the Middle District of Louisiana
position: United States District Judge for the Middle District of Louisiana
